author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Coronavirus: Senate agrees $1.8tn stimulus package with Trump
description: The deal to alleviate the economic impact of coronavirus on the US is worth more than $1.8 trillion.
content:
Media captionTrump on goal to reopen US by Easter: It's 'a beautiful timeline'
A stimulus package worth more than $1.8 trillion ((£1.5tn) has been agreed by US Senate leaders and the White House to ease the impact of coronavirus.
It reportedly includes paym… [+3475 chars]
